name: French Carrot Cake
author: Joan Drury

ingredients.name: C. firmly packed dark brown sugar

instructions: Preheat oven to 350Â°. Grease two 9 inch round cake pans. In th bowl of an electric mixer, cream butter with sugars. Add eggs and vanilla and beat until mixture is light and fluffy. Sift together flour, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon. Add these ingredients to batter; mix well. Fold in carrots and walnuts. Pour batter evenly into pans; bake for 40 to 45 minutes, until tester inserted in center comes out clean. Remove from oven to racks and cool completely before frosting. (Up to this point the recipe may be made in advance and placed in the freezer. Defrost and decorate with frosting.) Ice the tops of the layers Joan Drury and then assemble the cake. Frost the sides with remaining frosting. Decorate top of cake with carrot designs made from green and orange frosting or sprinkle the top with chopped walnuts and serve.
